程序包 org.apache.giraph.comm
的使用

  • 使用org.apache.giraph.comm的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.giraph.bsp
    Package of generic bulk synchronous processing objects.
    org.apache.giraph.comm
    Package of communication related objects, IPC service.
    org.apache.giraph.comm.netty
    Package for netty implementations.
    org.apache.giraph.comm.netty.handler
    Package for classes which handle requests and responses.
    org.apache.giraph.comm.requests
    Package for requests.
    org.apache.giraph.graph
    Package of all the graph related objects, built on the org.apache.bsp package.
    org.apache.giraph.master
    Package of all the master related things.
    org.apache.giraph.worker
    Package of all the worker related things
  • org.apache.giraph.bsp使用的org.apache.giraph.comm中的类 
    类和说明
    ServerData
    Anything that the server stores
    WorkerClient
    Public interface for workers to establish connections and send aggregated requests.
  • org.apache.giraph.comm使用的org.apache.giraph.comm中的类 
    类和说明
    SendCache
    An abstract structure for caching data indexed by vertex id, to be sent to workers in bulk.
    ServerData
    Anything that the server stores
  • org.apache.giraph.comm.netty使用的org.apache.giraph.comm中的类 
    类和说明
    MasterClient
    Interface for master to send messages to workers
    MasterServer
    Interface for master to receive messages from workers
    ServerData
    Anything that the server stores
    WorkerClient
    Public interface for workers to establish connections and send aggregated requests.
    WorkerClientRequestProcessor
    Aggregates IPC requests and sends them off
    WorkerServer
    Interface for message communication server.
  • org.apache.giraph.comm.netty.handler使用的org.apache.giraph.comm中的类 
    类和说明
    ServerData
    Anything that the server stores
  • org.apache.giraph.comm.requests使用的org.apache.giraph.comm中的类 
    类和说明
    ServerData
    Anything that the server stores
  • org.apache.giraph.graph使用的org.apache.giraph.comm中的类 
    类和说明
    WorkerClientRequestProcessor
    Aggregates IPC requests and sends them off
  • org.apache.giraph.master使用的org.apache.giraph.comm中的类 
    类和说明
    MasterClient
    Interface for master to send messages to workers
  • org.apache.giraph.worker使用的org.apache.giraph.comm中的类 
    类和说明
    ServerData
    Anything that the server stores
    WorkerClient
    Public interface for workers to establish connections and send aggregated requests.
